paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data.

functional_data.summary: The variant is associated with familial amyloidosis with polyneuropathy.

variants.segregation_data: The variant is pathogenic and associated with the disease.
variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence for pathogenicity based on clinical association.
variants.additional_notes: The variant was identified in three UC-MSC lines that were excluded from further analysis.
key_quotes: three out of 20 UC-MSC lines had pathogenic and dominant mutations at G6PD and TTR, which led us to exclude these lines from the pool.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data for the TTR gene was successfully extracted.
